name: Aster Ramesh Hospitals
description: Aster Ramesh Hospitals, established in the year 1988, was the actualisation of its founder Dr.P.Ramesh Babu's vision to make the city of Vijayawada and its surrounding regions self sufficient in Cardiac care. the norm until then was to refer patients to Chennai or Hyderabad. As Vijayawada's first dedicated Cardiac care destination, the hospital was able to preserve many lives through sheer clinical excellence. In 2008, the hospital evolved into a multi-speciality hospital by expanding its scope of services.Ramesh Hospitals is on the verge of commencing a 350 bedded multi super specialty hospital in the heart of Guntur city. By consistently practising scientific medicine with integrity and dedication, Ramesh Hospitals has gained the trust of patients and health care professionals from all over the Country.
features: Leveraging technology to bridge the time and distance gap and ensure transparency in care to your loved ones.

It offers essential services such as 24/7 emergency care, leverages technology for transparent patient care, and provides personalized outpatient experiences, contributing to comprehensive employee well-being programs.
